name: Volcarona
author: Kyoko Umemoto
flavor_text: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona’s fire provided a replacement for the sun.

attacks.name: Solar Birth
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards and attach them to that Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.
